Name: DISK_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED
Desc: PSM has detected that disk occupancy is above 75% on one or more partitions. Recommendation is to free up disk space on the PSM node(s) by removing firmware images, tech-support bundles and config snapshots. If the event occurs repeatedly, collect show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

Name: DSC_ENDPOINT_MIGRATION_FAILED
Desc: PSM encountered an error during the migration of a workload to target DSC. Existing flows may experience interruption in traffic. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando support.

Name: DSC_ENDPOINT_MIGRATION_TIMEOUT
Desc: PSM migration of a workload to target DSC exceeded the time limit and was aborted. Traffic may be impacted. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando support.

Name: MIGRATION_FAILED
Desc: PSM encountered an error during the migration of a workload to target DSC. Existing flows may experience interruption in traffic. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando support.

Name: MIGRATION_TIMED_OUT
Desc: PSM migration of a workload to target DSC exceeded the time limit and was aborted. Traffic may be impacted. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando support.

Name: ORCH_ALREADY_MANAGED
Desc: Another PSM may be managing the same namespace

Name: ORCH_CONFIG_PUSH_FAILURE
Desc: PSM was unable to write configuration to an external orchestrator. Some functionality may be impacted. Recommendation is for the user to verify orchestrator permissions given to PSM.

Name: ORCH_CONNECTION_ERROR
Desc: PSM failed to connect to orchestrator. Recommendation is to check connectivity between PSM and orchestrator.

Name: ORCH_DSC_MODE_INCOMPATIBLE
Desc: DSC profile is incompatible for Orchestrator integration. Recommendation is to make sure DSC is set to the correct profile.

Name: ORCH_DSC_NOT_ADMITTED
Desc: Workload provisioned on a host with no admitted DSC

Name: ORCH_HOST_CONFLICT
Desc: Unable to create host due to conflicts with a user created host

Name: ORCH_INVALID_ACTION
Desc: User performed an action that is not supported

Name: ORCH_LOGIN_FAILURE
Desc: Login credentials were invalid for orchestrator.

Name: VNIC_SESSION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
Desc: Session count for vnic reached limit, new sessions will be dropped

Name: VNIC_SESSION_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED
Desc: Session count for vnic exceeds threshold, new sessions will be dropped once limit is reached

Name: VNIC_SESSION_WITHIN_THRESHOLD
Desc: Session count for vnic falls within the threshold

cluster.Name: AUDITING_FAILED
cluster.Desc: PSM failed to generate an audit event for an API call. This usually indicates problems with the embedded data store. Recommendation is to check the health of the cluster nodes. If the event occurs repeatedly, collect show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

cluster.Name: AUTO_GENERATED_TLS_CERT
cluster.Desc: Auto generated certificate is being used for API Gateway TLS

cluster.Name: CONFIG_RESTORE_FAILED
cluster.Desc: The system failed to restore system configuration from a snapshot. This could be due to a corrupted snapshot or version incompatibility.

cluster.Name: DSC_UNHEALTHY
cluster.Desc: DSC has experienced a process crash. System performance may be impacted. Further policy changes will not be applied to this DSC till the server is reloaded. Recommendation is to collect a show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

cluster.Name: DSC_UNREACHABLE
cluster.Desc: DSC is not reachable from PSM. Recommendation is to check connectivity between PSM and corresponding DSC management port.

cluster.Name: ELECTION_NOTIFICATION_FAILED
cluster.Desc: Failed to send leader election notification

cluster.Name: ELECTION_STARTED
cluster.Desc: Leader election started in the cluster

cluster.Name: HOST_DSC_SPEC_CONFLICT
cluster.Desc: The system has detected a conflict between the DSC specifications of different Host objects

cluster.Name: ICMP_ACTIVE_SESSION_LIMIT_REACHED
cluster.Desc: Maximum configured ICMP Session Limit for DSC reached. No more new ICMP sessions will be allowed until the old ones age out. Recommendation is to check for misbehaving hosts, and increase the ICMP session limit, if needed.

cluster.Name: LEADER_LOST
cluster.Desc: Node lost leadership during the election

cluster.Name: NODE_UNREACHABLE
cluster.Desc: One of the PSM cluster nodes is disconnected from the leader node. Recommendation is to check that the disconnected node is available and verify connectivity from this node.

cluster.Name: QUORUM_MEMBER_UNHEALTHY
cluster.Desc: One of the member PSM nodes is not able to participate in quorum activities. Recommendation is to check the node's health (CPU/Memory/Disk) and verify network connectivity between PSM controller nodes. If no anomalies are observed and the event happens repeatedly, collect show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

cluster.Name: QUORUM_UNHEALTHY
cluster.Desc: System has detected that the number of available quorum nodes is below the minimum threshold (N/2+1). Recommendation is to check which quorum nodes are unhealthy and try to bring them back online. Check each node (CPU/Memory) and verify network connectivity between PSM controller nodes. If the issue cannot be resolved, contact Pensando Support.

cluster.Name: TCP_HALF_OPEN_SESSION_LIMIT_REACHED
cluster.Desc: Maximum set TCP Session Limit of DSC reached. No more new TCP sessions will be allowed until the old ones age out. Recommendation is to check for misbehaving hosts, and increase the TCP session limit, if needed.

cluster.Name: UDP_ACTIVE_SESSION_LIMIT_REACHED
cluster.Desc: Maximum set UDP Session Limit of DSC reached. No more new UDP sessions will be allowed until the old ones age out. Recommendation is to check for misbehaving hosts, and increase the UDP session limit, if needed.

cluster.Name: UNSUPPORTED_QUORUM_SIZE
cluster.Desc: PSM cluster requires a minimum of 3 quorum nodes to operate in a highly-available fashion. The system has detected that the number of quorum nodes is below the minimum. Recommendation is to contact Pensando Support.

rollout.Name: ROLLOUT_FAILED
rollout.Desc: Software rollout was not completed successfully. Check Rollout Status to get more details.

system.Name: DSC_CATTRIP_INTERRUPT
system.Desc: DSC temperature has crossed a fatal threshold, and this DSC has been reloaded. Recommendation is to check environmental conditions.

system.Name: DSC_ERR_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC has detected PCIe link error. System performance may be impacted. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando Support.

system.Name: DSC_FILESYSTEM_USAGE_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
system.Desc: Usage of the filesystem partition is above threshold

system.Name: DSC_FILESYSTEM_USAGE_BELOW_THRESHOLD
system.Desc: Usage of the filesystem partition is below threshold

system.Name: DSC_INFO_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC has detected a pcie link health event

system.Name: DSC_MEM_TEMP_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
system.Desc: DSC memory temperature is above the critical threshold. System performance may be degraded

system.Name: DSC_MEM_TEMP_BELOW_THRESHOLD
system.Desc: DSC memory temperature has fallen below the critical threshold

system.Name: DSC_PANIC_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC encountered a panic during the last boot. Recommendation is to collect show tech and contact Pensando support.

system.Name: DSC_POST_DIAG_FAILURE_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC post diag test failed

system.Name: DSC_SERVICE_STARTED
system.Desc: DSC service started

system.Name: DSC_SERVICE_STOPPED
system.Desc: DSC related process has been stopped. System performance may be impacted. Further policy changes will not be applied to this DSC till it is reloaded. Recommendation is to collect a show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

system.Name: DSC_WARN_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC has detected a pcie link health warning

system.Name: FLOWLOGS_DISK_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED
system.Desc: Flowlogs disk threshold exceeded

system.Name: FLOWLOGS_DROPPED
system.Desc: Firewall flow logs have been dropped. Check the alert to get more inforamation.

system.Name: FLOWLOGS_RATE_LIMITED
system.Desc: Firewall flow logs are currently rate-limited. Check the alert to get more information.

system.Name: FLOWLOGS_REPORTING_ERROR
system.Desc: Flowlogs could not be reported

system.Name: NAPLES_CATTRIP_INTERRUPT
system.Desc: DSC temperature has crossed a fatal threshold, and this DSC has been reloaded. Recommendation is to check environmental conditions.

system.Name: NAPLES_ERR_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC has detected PCIe link error. System performance may be impacted. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando Support.

system.Name: NAPLES_FATAL_INTERRUPT
system.Desc: DSC has encountered a fatal interrupt. System performance may be impacted. Recommendation is to collect tech-support and contact Pensando support.

system.Name: NAPLES_INFO_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: System has detected a pcie link health event

system.Name: NAPLES_OVER_TEMP
system.Desc: DSC temperature is above the critical threshold of 105C, system performance may be degraded. Host will be reloaded if temperature crosses fatal threshold. Recommendation is to check environmental conditions.

system.Name: NAPLES_OVER_TEMP_EXIT
system.Desc: System temperature is below threshold.

system.Name: NAPLES_PANIC_EVENT
system.Desc: DSC encountered a panic during the last boot. Recommendation is to collect show tech and contact Pensando support.

system.Name: NAPLES_POST_DIAG_FAILURE_EVENT
system.Desc: System post diag test failed

system.Name: NAPLES_SERVICE_STOPPED
system.Desc: DSC related process has been stopped. System performance may be impacted. Further policy changes will not be applied to this DSC till it is reloaded. Recommendation is to collect a show-tech and contact Pensando Support.

system.Name: NAPLES_WARN_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
system.Desc: System has detected a pcie link health warning

system.Name: SERVICE_PENDING
system.Desc: Service pending

system.Name: SERVICE_RUNNING
system.Desc: Service running

system.Name: SERVICE_STARTED
system.Desc: Service started

system.Name: SERVICE_STOPPED
system.Desc: Service stopped

system.Name: SERVICE_UNRESPONSIVE
system.Desc: A PSM service failed to start or became unresponsive. Some functionality may not be available. Recommendation is to check health of PSM nodes (CPU/Memory/Disk) and verify network connectivity.

system.Name: SYSTEM_COLDBOOT
system.Desc: System cold booted

system.Name: SYSTEM_RESOURCE_USAGE
system.Desc: System resource usage is high
